levels.Ⅰ: :instant: Change your next Attack roll to "0".
levels.Ⅳ:
:instant: Your selected [unit](../units/index.md) gains +1 :attack:

— OR —

:instant: Your selected [unit](../units/index.md) gains +1 :defense:

This effect doubles for the [Ranged unit](../units/index.md).
levels.Ⅵ: :instant: Change your next attack roll on any side.
